A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some cool moments\, no doubt a decent time for casual viewers\, but too much good setup wasted for me to say I was satisfied. Most frustrating part of this movie was Laura Dem's character who irrationally created a bunch of conflict by keeping her plan to herself and letting Poe die inside at her decisions. Poe would have been on her side if she used a little communication\, such a dumb plot point.
